name: Maze Laser - Local 2P Minigame
description:
Get moving fast ! In this thrilling 2 player local minigame with one keyboard, each player disposes of a little character and 2 lasers to try to eliminate or block the other player from getting to the goal !
Use Keys : WASD + ER (lasers) for player 1 and IJKL + OP(lasers) for player 2
